title: How many octaves are there in a piano? - Quora

response.answer_text: Usually a grand piano has 7 octaves plus three lower notes (B, B flat and A) and also an extra high C at the end. Or 88 keys But usually a more portable piano and more common in stores they have 5 octaves only
Almost every modern piano has 52 white keys and 36 black keys for a total of 88 keys (seven octaves plus a minor third, from A0 to C8).
